name: The RUN (Early Access)
description:
Make runs against top runners in the world of The Run with beautiful graphics. To be a good runner, it is the time to apply your skill so as to win but your opponent won't let you win 

3..... 2....... 1........ RUN!!!!!!!

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

W - Accelerate 

S - Reverse

A & D - Steer left & Right respectively

( You can still use the directional arrow keys for the above controls)

SPACE - Brake 

ESCAPE - Pause

NOTE

This game is still in development and may contain some bugs. And also it is a demo ( early access)  so please leave a feedback for any issue experience when playing the game. Furthermore, I uploaded it for you people to test, when this game will be update , new feature will be added like ;

  • Resizable window 
  • More levels
  • Graphics improvement
  • Bugs fix
  • More cars
  • Input control like controller
  • Ability for the user to change control
  • And more 

NO INSTALLATION NEEDED*
